definitions: A large number or amount of people or things.

definitions: A large number or amount; a lot.
examples: There are lots of things to do here.

definitions: Fifteen minutes before the specified hour.

examples: It's a quarter to three.

definitions: Fifteen minutes after the specified hour.
A way of telling time, meaning 15 minutes after the hour.

definitions: At a higher level or position than something.

definitions: During the period of time following an event.

definitions: The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.

definitions: Before the present; in the past.
